price: Sọ pé: “Olúwa mi ni mò ń pè. Àti pé èmi kò níí sọ ẹnì kan kan di akẹgbẹ́ fún Un.”
arabic: قُلۡ إِنَّمَآ أَدۡعُواْ رَبِّي وَلَآ أُشۡرِكُ بِهِۦٓ أَحَدٗا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: qul innamā adʿū rabbī walā ush'riku bihi aḥadan
